/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy overhead. Construction cranes loom in the background, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the urban landscape. The blue car parked on the side of the street adds a pop of color to the scene.
